title: Sneha Pandey Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Sneha Pandey? Check out all of Sneha Pandey's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogSneha Pandey Insights Manager Sneha Pandey Sneha Pandey is a Marketing Manager at Similarweb, a digital intelligence platform that provides a comprehensive and detailed view of the digital world. As a part of the Corporate Communications team, she generates powerful data-driven insights into current events and global trends across industries with specializations in Retail & eCommerce, Politics, CPG, and B2B Software. She has worked with valuable Fortune 50 companies by leveraging marketing and research intelligence to help them win their respective markets. Additionally, she is a graduate of Purdue University's Krannert School of Management. Show more Insights Unlocking the Leading 20 US DTC Footwear Brands Ecommerce News by Sneha Pandey 5 Min.
